src.sql:
select A.Id, 
   U.UserId
   FROM app.QuestionAnswerAnswer QAA
left join app.Answer A on A.Id = QAA.AnswerId
left join dbo.Users U on U.UserId = A.CreatedBy
left join app.AnswerUserVotes AUV on AUV.AnswerId = QAA.AnswerId 

WHERE QAA.QuestionId = '[TknParams:QuestionId]' AND U.UserId =  '[TknParams:UserId]'
GROUP BY  Id, U.UserId
